evaṃpramukhaiḥ daśa buddhakṣetra pramāṇu rajaḥ samaiḥ praṇidhāna abhinirhāra mukha samudraiḥ

original: sa bhagavān samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājastathāgataḥ pūrvakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayati udyotayati saṃdarśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati saṃprakāśayati  #
analyzed: sa bhagavān samantajñānaratna arci śrīguṇaketurājaḥ tathāgataḥ pūrva kuśala mūlāni saṃcodayati udyotayati saṃdarśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati saṃprakāśayati
sārīkaroti a vipraṇāśa tāyai

sthāpayati sarvajña tā pramāṇīkaraṇa tāyai

original: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani tataḥ pareṇa daśame kalpe maṇisūryacandravidyotitaprabhāyāṃ

dārikayā samantabhadra bodhisattva samādāpitayā pralugnaḥ tathāgata vigrahaḥ padma niṣaṇṇaḥ pratisaṃskāritaḥ

citrayitvā ratna pratimaṇḍitaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: yadā cāsmi samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,

original: tathāgatavikurvitaprātihāryaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā dharmaśca me tasya bhagavato 'ntikācchrutaḥ,
analyzed: tathāgata vikurvita prātihāryam ca dṛṣṭvā dharmaḥ ca me tasya bhagavataḥ ntikāt śrutaḥ

original: sarve ca te sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ, (Gv 216)

yaḥ ca taiḥ tathāgataiḥ dharmaḥ bhāṣitaḥ

original: teṣu ca me tathāgateṣu tīvraṃ gauravaṃ pratilabdhaṃ yathārūpeṇa gauraveṇa ekacittakṣaṇe

nāma kalpaḥ bhūt

mahāpadma saṃsthānā viśuddha saṃkliṣṭā sumeru paramāṇu rajaḥ sama puṣpa cakravāla parivṛtā
sumeru paramāṇu rajaḥ sama gandhamaṇi sumeru abhyudgata alaṃkārā sumeru paramāṇu rajaḥ sama mahā cāturdvīpika alaṃkārā
ekaikasyām cāturdvīpikāyām anabhilāpya anabhilāpya nagara koṭī niyuta śata sahasrāṇi abhūvan

original: tasyāṃ khalu kulaputra lokadhātau vimalaprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamatathāgataprabhavaḥ /
analyzed: tasyām khalu kula putra lokadhātau vimalaprabhaḥ nāma kalpaḥ bhūt sumeru paramāṇu rajaḥ sama tathāgata prabhavaḥ

original: tasyāṃ ca dharmārcinagarameghāyāṃ lokadhātau madhyamā vicitradhvajā nāma cāturdvīpikābhūt /
analyzed: tasyām ca dharma arci nagara meghāyām lokadhātau madhyamā vicitradhvajā nāma cāturdvīpikā abhūt
tasyāḥ madhye samantaratnakusumaprabhā nāma rājadhānī abhūt

original: tasyā rājadhānyā nātidūre dharmarājabhavanapratibhāso nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
analyzed: tasyāḥ rājadhānyāḥ na atidūre dharmarājabhavanapratibhāsaḥ nāma bodhimaṇḍaḥ bhūt

original: tatra bodhimaṇḍe sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājo nāma tathāgata udapādi teṣāṃ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ prathamakalpikaḥ
analyzed: tatra bodhimaṇḍe sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ udapādi teṣām sumeru paramāṇu rajaḥ samānām tathāgatānām prathama kalpikaḥ

original: tena ca samayena vimalavakrabhānuprabho nāma rājā abhūt cakravartī /
analyzed: tena ca samayena vimalavakrabhānuprabhaḥ nāma rājā abhūt cakravartī

original: tena tasya bhagavataḥ sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājñastathāgatasyāntikāt sarvadharmasāgaro nāma sūtrānta udgṛhītaḥ /
analyzed: tena tasya bhagavataḥ sarva dharma sāgara nirghoṣa prabha rājñaḥ tathāgatasya antikāt sarvadharmasāgaraḥ nāma sūtrāntaḥ udgṛhītaḥ
udgṛhya ca dharmacakram anupravartitam
parinirvṛtasya ca pravrajitvā śāsanam saṃdhāritam

original: (Gv 236) śāsanāntardhānakāle ca sahasradhā bhinne śāsane daśanayaśatabhinnāyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmanantarakalpakaṣāye
analyzed: śāsana antardhāna kāle ca sahasradhā bhinne śāsane daśana yaśata bhinnāyām dharma deśanāyām anantara kalpa kaṣāye
pratyupasthite sarva karma kleśa āvaraṇa āvṛtānām sattvānām kalaha vigraha vivādam āpannānām
bhikṣūṇām ca buddha śāsana guṇa anarthikānām viṣaya rati parāyaṇānām rāja caura kathā abhiratānām
strī janapada samudra kathā abhiratānām lokāyata mantra abhiratānām udvega saṃjanana artham dhārmika

original: utkāsaḥ kṛto 'bhūt - aho bateyamanekakalpasamudānītā mahādharmolkā antardhāsyatīti
analyzed: utkāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhūt aho bata iyam aneka kalpa samudānītā mahā dharma ulkā antardhāsyati iti
saṃvega jananīyā kathā kṛtā

original: sa ūrdhvaṃ gaganatale saptatālamātramabhyudgamya anantavarṇānarcimeghānniścārya nānāvarṇān
analyzed: saḥ ūrdhvam gagana tale sapta tāla mātram abhyudgamya ananta varṇān arci meghān niścārya nānā varṇān

original: mahāraśmijālavyūhān kāyādutsṛjya anekavarṇayā prabhayā loke kleśatāpaṃ śamayitvā
analyzed: mahā raśmi jāla vyūhān kāyāt utsṛjya aneka varṇayā prabhayā loke kleśa tāpam śamayitvā
ananta madhyān sattvān bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa
tat ca tathāgata śāsanam punar jvālayitvā ṣaṣṭi varṣa sahasrāṇi asthāt

original: tena ca samayena dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma bhikṣuṇyabhūt tasyaiva vimalacakrabhānuprabhasya cakravartino duhitā bhikṣuṇīśatasahasraparivārā
analyzed: tena ca samayena dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma bhikṣuṇī abhūt tasya eva vimala cakrabhānuprabhasya cakravartinaḥ duhitā bhikṣuṇī śata sahasra parivārā

original: sā taṃ saṃvegaśabdaṃ śrutvā tacca mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā saparivārā bodhāya cittamutpādayāmāsa /
analyzed: sā tam saṃvega śabdam śrutvā tat ca mahā prātihāryam dṛṣṭvā sa parivārā bodhāya cittam utpādayāmāsa
tat ca bhikṣuṇī śata sahasram anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau a vaivartikam abhūt
tathāgata saṃmukhībhāva samavasaraṇam ca nāma samādhim pratyalabhata

original: sarvatathāgatadharmacakranirmāṇaprabhaṃ ca nāma dhāraṇī sarvadharmasāgaranayapraveśāṃ ca nāma prajñāpāramitāṃ pratyalabhata /
analyzed: sarva tathāgata dharma cakra nirmāṇa prabham ca nāma dhāraṇī sarva dharma sāgara naya praveśām ca nāma prajñāpāramitām pratyalabhata

original: dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā ca bhikṣuṇī sarvatathāgataśāsanasaṃbhavāvabhāsapradīpaṃ ca nāma samādhim,
analyzed: dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā ca bhikṣuṇī sarva tathāgata śāsana saṃbhava avabhāsa pradīpam ca nāma samādhim

original: etaṃ ca manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ ca bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ sūkṣmamṛdukaṃ pratyalabhata,
analyzed: etam ca manojña ruta gambhīra vikurvita praveśam ca bodhisattva vimokṣam sūkṣma mṛdukam pratyalabhata
yad pratilābhāt asya sarva dharma sāgaranirghoṣaprabharājasya tathāgatasya tat sarvam vikurvitam āmukhībhūtam

original: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabho
analyzed: tat kim manyase kula putra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vimala vaktra bhānu prabho
nāma rājā abhūt cakravartī yena tat sarva dharma sāgara nirghoṣa prabha rājñaḥ tathāgatasya
śāsane pravrajitvā dharma cakram anupravartitam
parinirvṛttasya ca śāsana antardhāna kāla samaye śāsanam saṃdhāritam
mahā dharma ulkā ca jvalitā

original: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: na khalu punar te kula putra evam draṣṭavyam

original: samantabhadro bodhisattvaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabho nāma rājā abhūccakravartī /
analyzed: samantabhadraḥ bodhisattvaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabhaḥ nāma rājā abhūt cakravartī

original: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabhasya
analyzed: tat kim manyase kula putra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimala vaktra bhānu prabhasya
rājñaḥ cakravartinaḥ dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma duhitā bhikṣuṇī abhūt bhikṣuṇī śata sahasra parivārā
na khalu evam draṣṭavyam

original: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma bhikṣuṇyabhūvam?
analyzed: aham sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma bhikṣuṇī abhūvam
mayā tat tasya sarva dharma sāgara nirghoṣa prabha rājñaḥ tathāgatasya śāsanam saṃdhāritam
tat ca bhikṣuṇī śata sahasram sarvam avaivartikam kṛtam anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau
tathāgata saṃmukhībhāva samavasaraṇe ca samādhau pratiṣṭhāpitam

original: sarvatathāgatadharmacakravajraprabhāyāṃ dhāraṇyāṃ sarvadharmasāgaranayapraveśāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam //

original: ekaikasmiṃśca sūtrānte lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ anantamadhyasattvavinayanirdeśā nānāyānanayaiḥ pravartitā nānāvikurvitaprātihāryavinayatāḥ

original: upetya piturdhanapate rājñaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya etamarthamārocayāmāsa - yatkhalu
analyzed: upetya pituḥ dhanapateḥ rājñaḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya etam artham ārocayāmāsa yat khalu

original: deva jānīyāḥ - sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
analyzed: deva jānīyāḥ sūryagātrapravaraḥ nāma tathāgataḥ rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ loke udapādi

original: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
analyzed: vidyā caraṇa saṃpannaḥ sugataḥ loka vid anuttaraḥ puruṣa damya sārathiḥ śāstā deva manuṣyāṇām buddhaḥ bhagavān

original: ihaiva tava vijite dharmameghodgataprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe viharatyacirābhisaṃbuddhaḥ /

original: atha khalu rājā dhanapatistejodhipatiṃ kumārametadavocat - kena te kumāra ayamarthaṃ ārocito devena vā manuṣyeṇa vā?
analyzed: atha khalu rājā dhanapatiḥ tejaḥ adhipatim kumāram etat avocat kena te kumāra ayam arthaḥ ārocitaḥ devena vā manuṣyeṇa vā
sa prāha su calita rati prabhāsa śriyā dārikayā iti

original: atha khalu rājā dhanapatirbuddhotpādaśravaṇena mahānidhānapratilābhasaṃjñī sudurlabhabuddharatnaparilābhasaṃjñī
analyzed: atha khalu rājā dhanapatiḥ buddha utpāda śravaṇena mahā nidhāna pratilābha saṃjñī su durlabha buddha ratna parilābha saṃjñī
tathāgata darśane sarva durgati prapāta bhaya vinivartana saṃjñī sarva kleśa vyādhi praśamana mahā vaidya rāja pratilābha saṃjñī
sarva saṃsāra duḥkha parimocaka saṃjñī atyanta yogakṣema pratiṣṭhāpaka saṃjñī vitimira jñāna āloka darśaka saṃjñī
avidyā andhakāra vidhvaṃsana mahā ulkā prādurbhāva saṃjñī anāyakasya lokasya dharma naya vināyaka pratilābha saṃjñī
apariṇāyakasya sarvajña tā yāna pariṇāyaka samutpāda saṃjñī mahā prīti prasāda prāmodya pratilabdhaḥ
buddha utpādam śrutvā kṣatriya brāhmaṇa naigama janapada amātya purohita kumāra koṭṭa rājānaḥ
dauvārika pārṣadyān ca saṃnipātya buddha utpāda nanda śabda āvedinaḥ tejaḥ adhipateḥ kumārasya
tat rājyam dharma ācchādam prādāt

original: sa taṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya sārdhaṃ daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasrairyena bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgatastenopajagāma /
analyzed: sa tam kumāram rājye bhiṣicya sārdham daśabhiḥ prāṇi sahasraiḥ yena bhagavān sūryagātra pravaraḥ tathāgataḥ tena upajagāma

original: upetya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavataḥ purastānnyaṣīdat sārdhaṃ  #
analyzed: upetya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya tam bhagavantam aneka śata sahasra kṛtvas pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavataḥ purastāt nyaṣīdat sārdham
svakena parivāreṇa

original: atha khalu kulaputra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgato dhanapatiṃ rājānaṃ sarvāvacca
analyzed: atha khalu kula putra sa bhagavān sūryagātra pravaraḥ tathāgataḥ dhanapatim rājānam sarvāvat ca

original: parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmūrṇākośātsarvajagaccittapradīpaṃ nāma raśmiṃ prāmuñcat /
analyzed: parṣad maṇḍalam avalokya tasyām velāyām ūrṇā kośāt sarvajagat citta pradīpam nāma raśmim prāmuñcat

original: sā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātūnavabhāsya sarvalokendrānabhimukhaṃ parisaṃsthāpya acintyāni buddhavikurvitāni (Gv 328)
analyzed: sā daśasu dikṣu sarva lokadhātūn avabhāsya sarva loka indrān abhimukham parisaṃsthāpya acintyāni buddha vikurvitāni

original: saṃdarśya buddhavainayikānāṃ sattvānāmāśayān viśodhya tasyāṃ velāyāmacintyena buddhādhipateyena
analyzed: saṃdarśya buddha vainayikānām sattvānām āśayān viśodhya tasyām velāyām acintyena buddha ādhipateyena

sarvadharmavitimirārthapradīpam nāma dhāraṇīmukham saṃprakāśayāmāsa buddhakṣetra paramāṇu rajaḥ sama dhāraṇīmukha parivāram

original: atha rājño dhanapatestaddhāraṇīmukhaṃ śrutvā sarvadharmeṣu mahān dharmāvabhāsaḥ prādurabhūt /
analyzed: atha rājñaḥ dhanapateḥ tat dhāraṇī mukham śrutvā sarva dharmeṣu mahān dharma avabhāsaḥ prādurabhūt

original: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavitimirārthapradīpāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
analyzed: tasyām ca parṣadi jambudvīpa paramāṇu rajaḥ samānām bodhisattvānām sarva dharma vitimira artha pradīpāyāḥ dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambhaḥ bhūt
ṣaṣṭeḥ ca prāṇi niyutānām an upādāya āsravebhyaḥ cittāni vimuktāni

original: daśānāṃ ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham /
analyzed: daśānām ca prāṇi sahasrāṇām virajaḥ vigata malam dharmeṣu dharma cakṣuḥ viśuddham
aparimāṇānām an utpanna pūrvam anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpannam

original: rājñaśca dhanapatermahādharmāvabhāsapratilabdhasya etadabhavat - na śakyamagāramadhyāvasatā imā evaṃrūpā dharmā adhimoktum,
analyzed: rājñaḥ ca dhanapateḥ mahā dharma avabhāsa pratilabdhasya etat abhavat na śakyam agāram adhyāvasatā imāḥ evaṃrūpāḥ dharmāḥ adhimoktum
evaṃrūpam ca jñānam niṣpādayitum
yat nu aham bhagavataḥ ntike pravrājayeyam

original: atha khalu rājā dhanapatistaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - labheyāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntike pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam /
analyzed: atha khalu rājā dhanapatiḥ tam bhagavantam etat avocat labheya aham bhagavataḥ ntike pravrajyām upasaṃpadam bhikṣu bhāvam

original: atha khalu rājā dhanapatiḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasyāntike prāvrajat sārdhaṃ daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ /
analyzed: atha khalu rājā dhanapatiḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya antike prāvrajat sārdham daśabhiḥ prāṇi sahasraiḥ

original: tena acireṇa pravrajitena sarvadharmavitimirārthapradīpaṃ dhāraṇīmukhaṃ saparivāraṃ niṣpāditaṃ bhāvitam,
analyzed: tena acireṇa pravrajitena sarva dharma vitimira artha pradīpam dhāraṇī mukham sa parivāram niṣpāditam bhāvitam

ananta madhyam ca pratisaṃvid naya sāgarām avatīrṇaḥ

original: asaṅgagocarā ca nāma kāyapariśuddhiḥ daśadiktathāgatopasaṃkramaṇeṣu pratilabdhā /

original: sa tasya bhagavato dharmacakraṃ pratīcchitavān saṃdhāritavān,
analyzed: sa tasya bhagavataḥ dharmacakram pratīcchitavān saṃdhāritavān
kathāpuruṣa tvam ca kārayāmāsa
mahā dharma bhāṇaka tvam ca akarot
śāsana parigraham ca akārṣīt

original: abhijñāpratilābhabalena ca sarvāvatīṃ lokadhātuṃ spharitvā yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ
analyzed: abhijñā pratilābha balena ca sarvāvatīm lokadhātum spharitvā yathā āśayānām sattvānām

original: kāyaṃ saṃdarśya etaṃ buddhotpādaṃ prabhāvayan tāṃ sarvatathāgatasamudayadharmatāmabhidyotayan
analyzed: kāyam saṃdarśya etam buddha utpādam prabhāvayan tām sarva tathāgata samudaya dharmatām abhidyotayan

original: tāṃ pūrvayogasaṃpadaṃ saṃprakāśayan taṃ buddhavikurvitaprabhāvaṃ saṃvarṇayamānaḥ
analyzed: tām pūrva yoga saṃpadam saṃprakāśayan tam buddha vikurvita prabhāvam saṃvarṇayamānaḥ

original: tejodhipatinā ca rājaputreṇa tatraiva divase pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ sapta ratnāni pratilabdhāni /

mahā cakra ratnam prādurabhūt
vajraratna giri tejaḥ ca nāma mahā hasti ratnam prādurabhūt
nīlagiri anilavegam ca nāma aśva ratnam prādurabhavat

original: sā ca sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrī dārikā strīratnaṃ prādurabhavat /

original: vimalanetraṃ ca nāma pariṇāyakaratnaṃ saptamaṃ prādurabhavat /

original: sa saptaratnasamanvāgato rājābhavaccakravartī caturdvīpeśvaro dhārmiko dharmarājo vijitāvī janapadasthāmavīryaprāptaḥ /

original: pūrṇaṃ khalu punarasya sahasraṃ putrāṇāmabhūcchūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
analyzed: pūrṇam khalu punar asya sahasram putrāṇām abhūt śūrāṇām vīrāṇām vara aṅga rūpiṇām para sainya pramardakānām

original: sphītāṃ kṣemāṃ subhikṣāṃ ramaṇīyāmākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃ dharmeṇābhinirjitya adhyāvasati sma //

original: sarvāsu ca tāsu rājadhānīṣu taṃ bhagavantaṃ sūryagātrapravaraṃ tathāgataṃ saparivāramupanimantrayāmāsa nagarapraveśāya /

tatra aprasanna cittāḥ sattvāḥ prasādam pratyalabhanta

bodhi āśaya viśuddhāḥ sattvāḥ mahā karuṇā cetanām utpādayāmāsuḥ
sattva hita pratipannāḥ sattvāḥ sarva buddha dharma paryeṣṭi abhiyuktāḥ abhūvan
buddha dharma naya vidhi jñāḥ sattvāḥ sarva dharma svabhāva nidhi aptaye cittam abhinirṇāmayāmāsuḥ

vicitra tathāgata vijñapti avakrāntāḥ sattvāḥ sarva jagat saṃgrahāya cittam abhinirṇāmayāmāsuḥ

original: ityevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāmimāmevaṃrūpārthasiddhiṃ saṃpraveśya tejodhipatī rājā sarvāsu
analyzed: iti evaṃrūpāṇām sattvānām imām evaṃrūpa artha siddhim saṃpraveśya tejaḥ adhipatiḥ rājā sarvāsu

original: rājadhānīṣu taṃ sūryagātrapravaraṃ tathāgataṃ praveśayāmāsa acintyena buddhavikurvitaprātihāryasaṃdarśanena
analyzed: rājadhānīṣu tam sūryagātra pravaram tathāgatam praveśayāmāsa acintyena buddha vikurvita prātihārya saṃdarśanena

original: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipatirnāma rājaputro 'bhūt?
analyzed: tat kim manyase kula putra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipatiḥ nāma rāja putraḥ bhūt

analyzed: ratnakusumaprabhaḥ nāma tathāgataḥ tena kālena tena samayena dhanapatiḥ nāma rājā abhūt

original: tena ca bhagavatā ratnakusumaprabheṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvadharmadhātugaganapratibhāsamegho lokadhātusamudraḥ pariśodhitaḥ

original: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt tejodhipateḥ kumārasya mātā caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇāṃ

original: mahāśvāsaṃ dātukāmo bhavacārakāvaruddhānāṃ jñānaprahāṇaṃ dātukāmo dṛṣṭibandhanabaddhānāṃ

citta bhūtam hṛdaya saṃtuṣṭi karaṇatayā
yajña upakaraṇa bhūtam sarva jagat saṃtarpaṇa tayā
buddhi bhūtam sarva jagat citta jyeṣṭha śreṣṭha tayā
nidhāna bhūtam sarva buddha dharma udgrahaṇa tayā
uddāna bhūtam sarva bodhisattva caryā praṇidhāna saṃgrahaṇa tayā
pālaka bhūtam sarva loka anupālana tayā
ārakṣaka bhūtam sarva pāpa vinivartana tayā
indrajāla bhūtam kleśa asura ākarṣaṇa tayā
varuṇa pāśa bhūtam vineya ākarṣaṇa tayā
indra agni bhūtam sarva vāsanā anuśaya kleśa nirdahana tayā
caitya bhūtam sa deva mānuṣa asurasya lokasya
iti hi kula putra bodhisattvaḥ ca anyaiḥ ca apramāṇaiḥ guṇa viśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ
saṃkṣiptena kula putra yāvantaḥ sarva buddha dharmāḥ sarva buddha guṇāḥ ca
tāvantaḥ bodhi citta guṇāḥ ca tāvantaḥ bodhi citta guṇa anuśaṃsāḥ anugantavyāḥ
tat kasya hetoḥ
atas prabhavati sarva bodhisattva caryā maṇḍalam
niryānti atīta anāgata pratyutpannāḥ sarva tathāgatāḥ

original: tasmāttarhi kulaputra yena anuttarāyāṃ samaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi kula putra yena anuttarāyām samaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditam
saḥ pramāṇa guṇa samuditaḥ bhavati sarvajña tā citta adhyāśaya su saṃgṛhīta tvāt
tat yathā api nāma kula putra
asti abhayā nāma oṣadhiḥ
tayā pañca bhayāni na bhavanti
tat yathā agninā na dahyate
viṣasya na ākramati
śastreṇa na kṣaṇyate
udakena na uhyate
dhūmena na mriyate

original: evameva kulaputra sarvajñatācittauṣadhiparigṛhīto bodhisattvo rāgāgninā na dahyate,
analyzed: evam eva kula putra sarvajña tā citta oṣadhi parigṛhītaḥ bodhisattvaḥ rāga agninā na dahyate
viṣaya viṣamasya na ākramati
kleśa śastreṇa na kṣaṇyate
bhava oghena na uhyate
saṃkalpadhūmena na mriyate
tat yathā kula putra asti anirmuktā nāma oṣadhiḥ
tayā gṛhītayā sarva para upakrama bhayāni na bhavanti

original: evameva bodhicittajñānauṣadhiparigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarvasaṃsāropakramabhayāni na bhavanti /
analyzed: evam eva bodhi citta jñāna oṣadhi parigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarva saṃsāra upakrama bhayāni na bhavanti
tat yathā kula putra
asti maghī nāma oṣadhiḥ
tayā gṛhītayā gandhena eva sarva āśīviṣāḥ palāyante
evam eva bodhi citta gandhena eva sarva kleśa āśīviṣāḥ palāyante

original: tadyathā kulaputra aparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhītaḥ puruṣo 'jayo bhavati sarvaśatrumaṇḍalena,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra aparājita bhaiṣajya gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ jayaḥ bhavati sarva śatru maṇḍalena

original: evameva sarvajñatācittāparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvamārapratyarthikamaṇḍalena /
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta aparājita bhaiṣajya gṛhītaḥ bodhisattvaḥ durgharṣaḥ bhavati sarva māra pratyarthika maṇḍalena

original: tadyathā kulaputra asti vigamo nāma bhaiṣajyam /
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra asti vigamaḥ nāma bhaiṣajyam
tena sarva śalyāḥ patanti
evam eva bodhi citta vigama bhaiṣajya parigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarva rāga doṣa moha dṛṣṭi śalyāḥ patanti

original: tadyathā kulaputra asti sudarśano nāma mahābhaiṣajyarājaḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra asti sudarśanaḥ nāma mahā bhaiṣajya rājaḥ
tad gṛhītaḥ sarva vyādhīn nirghātayati
evam eva bodhi citta sudarśana mahā bhaiṣajya rāja gṛhītaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva kleśa ajñāna vyādhīn nirghātayati

original: tadyathā kulaputra asti saṃtāno nāma mahābhaiṣajyavṛkṣaḥ /
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra asti saṃtānaḥ nāma mahā bhaiṣajya vṛkṣaḥ
tasya saha nipātitā tvac sarva vraṇān saṃrohayati
yathā utpāṭitā asya tvac saṃbhavati

original: evameva bodhisattvabījasaṃbhūtaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃtānavṛkṣaḥ sahadarśanena śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ karmakleśavraṇān saṃrohayati /
analyzed: evam eva bodhisattva bīja saṃbhūtaḥ sarvajña tā saṃtāna vṛkṣaḥ saha darśanena śrāddhānām kula putrāṇām karma kleśa vraṇān saṃrohayati
sa ca sarvajña tā vṛkṣaḥ sarva lokena akṣataḥ na upahataḥ
tat yathā kula putra asti anirvṛttamūlā nāma mahā bhaiṣajya jātiḥ
yasyāḥ prabhāvena sarva jambudvīpakāḥ
vṛkṣā sarvā vivardhante
evam eva bodhi citta nirvṛtta mūla mahābhaiṣajya prabhāvena sarva śaikṣa aśaikṣa pratyekabuddha bodhisattva dharma taravaḥ vivardhante
tat yathā kula putra asti ratilambhā nāma oṣadhiḥ
sā yasya śarīra gatā bhavati
tasya kāya citta kalya tā jāyate
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda rati lambha oṣadhiḥ sarva bodhisattvānām kāya citta kalya tām saṃjanayati
tat yathā kula putra asti smṛtilabdhā nāma oṣadhiḥ
tayā citta smṛtiḥ viśudhyati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda smṛti lambha oṣadhiḥ bodhisattvānām sarva buddha dharma an āvaraṇa smṛti viśuddhaye saṃvartate
tat yathā kula putra asti mahāpadmā nāma oṣadhiḥ
tayā kalpam āyuḥ pramāṇam bhavati
evam eva bodhi citta mahā dharma oṣadhi prasitaḥ bodhisattvaḥ saṃkhyeya kalpa āyuḥ vaśitā prāptaḥ bhavati
tat yathā kula putra asti adṛśyā nāma oṣadhiḥ
tayā gṛhītayā sarva manuṣya amanuṣyaiḥ na dṛśyate

original: evameva bodhicittādṛśyamahauṣadhigṛhīto vyavakīrṇavihārī bodhisattvaḥ sarvamāraviṣaye na dṛśyate /
analyzed: evam eva bodhi citta adṛśya mahā oṣadhi gṛhītaḥ vyavakīrṇa vihārī bodhisattvaḥ sarva māra viṣaye na dṛśyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra asti sarvamaṇiratnasamuccayaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnarājaṃ mahāsamudre /
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra asti sarvamaṇiratnasamuccayam nāma mahā maṇi ratna rājam mahā samudre

original: tasya anyalokadhātvasaṃkrāntasya asthānamanavakāśo yanmahāsamudrasya sarvakalpoddāhāgninā śakyaṃ tālamātramapi pariśoṣayitum /
analyzed: tasya anya lokadhātu asaṃkrāntasya asthānam anavakāśaḥ yat mahā samudrasya sarva kalpa uddāha agninā śakyam tāla mātram api pariśoṣayitum
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda sarva maṇi ratna samuccaya mahā maṇi ratna rāja adhyāśaya saṃtāna gatānām
bodhisattvānām asthānam anavakāśaḥ yat eka kuśalam api sarvajña tā pariṇāmitam praṇaśyet
na idam sthānam vidyate
utsṛṣṭe ca punar sarvajña tā citta utpāde sarva kuśala mūlāni upaśuṣyanti
tat yathā asti sarvaprabhāsasamuccayam nāma mahā maṇi ratnam
tena kaṇṭha avasaktena sarva maṇi ratna alaṃkārāḥ jihmībhavanti
evam eva bodhisattva sarva prabhāsa samuccaya mahā maṇi ratna āśaya alaṃkāra avabaddhaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha citta utpāda ratna alaṃkārān abhibhavati
tat yathā kula putra
asti udakaprasādakam mahā maṇi ratnam
tat vāri prakṣiptam sarva kardama kāluṣyam prasādayati
evam eva bodhi citta udaka prasādaka mahā maṇi ratnam sarva kleśa kardama kāluṣyam prasādayati

original: tadyathā kulaputra udakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ kaivarta udake na mriyate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putraḥ udaka saṃvāsa maṇi ratna avabaddhaḥ kaivarte udake na mriyate

original: evameva sarvajñatācittodakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnagṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃsārasāgare na mriyate /
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta udaka saṃvāsa maṇi ratna gṛhītaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva saṃsāra sāgare na mriyate
tat yathā kula putra asti nāga maṇi varma mahā ratnam

original: tena sahagate kaivartādayo jalajīvinaḥ sarvanāgabhavanāni praviśanto 'dhṛṣyā bhavanti sarvanāgoragaiḥ /
analyzed: tena sahagate kaivarta ādayaḥ jala jīvinaḥ sarva nāga bhavanāni praviśantaḥ dhṛṣyāḥ bhavanti sarva nāga uragaiḥ
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda jñāna nāga maṇi dharma dhārī bodhisattvaḥ sarva kāmadhātu bhavanāni praviśan na kṣaṇyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra śakrābhilagnamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ śakro devarājo sarvadevagaṇānabhibhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra śakra abhilagna maṇi ratna avabaddhaḥ śakraḥ devarājaḥ sarva deva gaṇān abhibhavati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta śakra abhilagna mahā maṇi ratnarāja praṇidhi makuṭa avabaddhaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva traidhātukam abhibhavati

original: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamahāmaṇiratnagṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvadāridryānna bibheti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra cintārāja mahā maṇi ratna gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarva dāridryāt na bibheti
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda cintā rāja mahā maṇi ratna gṛhītaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva upakaraṇa jīvikā bhayebhyaḥ na bibheti
tat yathā kula putra sūryakānta maṇi ratnam sūrya darśitam agnim pramuñcati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda sūryakānta maṇi ratnam prajñā ratna raśmi saṃsṛṣṭam jñāna agnim pramuñcati

original: tadyathā kulaputra candrakāntaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ candrābhayā spṛṣṭamudakadhārāṃ pramuñcati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra candrakāntam nāma mahā maṇi ratnam candrābhayā spṛṣṭam udaka dhārām pramuñcati
evam eva bodhi citta utpāda candrakānta mahā maṇi ratnam kuśala mūla pariṇāmanā candra prabhā spṛṣṭam sarva kuśala mūla praṇidhi toya dhārāḥ
pramuñcati

original: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇimakuṭāvabaddhānāṃ mahānāgarājānāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayam,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra cintārāja maṇi makuṭa avabaddhānām mahā nāga rājānām na asti para upakrama bhayam
evam eva bodhi citta mahā karuṇā cintā rāja maṇi makuṭa avabaddhānām na asti durgati apāya upasaṃkrama bhayam

original: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra jagadvyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvasattvābhiprāyaparipūraṇatayā na kadācitkṣayamupaiti,
analyzed: tat yathā api nāma kula putra jagadvyūhagarbham nāma mahā maṇi ratnam sarva sattva abhiprāya paripūraṇa tayā na kadācid kṣayam upaiti
evam eva bodhisattva citta utpāda sarva jagat vyūha garbha mahā maṇi ratnam sarva sattva abhiprāya bodhi praṇidhi paripūraṇa tayā na kadācid kṣayam upaiti

original: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino mahāmaṇiratnaḥ sa tamondhakāravidhamaṃ gacchati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra rājñaḥ cakravartinaḥ mahā maṇi ratnaḥ sa tamaḥ undhakāra vidhamam gacchati
antaḥpura madhya gatam ca prabhāsayati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda cakravarti mahā maṇi ratnam sarvam avidyā andhakāra vidhamam sattva gatiṣu gacchati
kāmadhātu sthitam
ca mahā jñāna ālokam avamuñcati
tat yathā kula putra ye indranīla mahā maṇi ratna ābhayā spṛśyante
sarve te indranīla mahā maṇi ratna varṇāḥ bhavanti
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda indranīla mahā maṇi ratnam yeṣu vicāryate preṣyate
yāni ca kuśala mūlāni sarvajña tā citta utpādena pariṇamyante
tāni sarvāṇi sarvajña tā mahā maṇi ratna varṇāni bhavanti

original: tadyathā kulaputra vaiḍūryamaṇiratnaṃ varṣaśatasahasramapi amedhyamadhyagataṃ tiṣṭhat sarvadaurgandhyena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vaiḍūrya maṇi ratnam varṣa śata sahasram api amedhya madhya gatam tiṣṭhat sarva daurgandhyena sārdham na saṃvasati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda atyanta vimala viśuddha prabha maṇi ratnam sarva pṛthagjana śaikṣa aśaikṣa pratyekabuddha guṇa ratna ākarān abhibhavati

original: tadyathā kulaputra ekamāgneyaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putraḥ ekam āgneyam nāma mahā maṇi ratnam sarva tamaḥ undhakāram vidhamati

original: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādāgneyamahāmaṇiratnaṃ vipaśyanāsaṃprayuktaṃ yoniśo manasikārataḥ sarvamajñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
analyzed: evam eva eka sarvajña tā citta utpāda āgneya mahā maṇi ratnam vipaśyanā saṃprayuktam yoniśas manasikārataḥ sarvam ajñāna tamaḥ undhakāram vidhamati

original: tadyathā kulaputra mahāsamudre potāropitamanardhyeyamaṇiratnaṃ vaṇigghastagataṃ nagarapratiṣṭhāni kācamaṇiśatasahasrāṇyabhibhavati varṇataśca
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra mahā samudre pota āropitam anardhyeya maṇi ratnam vaṇij hasta gatam nagara pratiṣṭhāni kāca maṇi śata sahasrāṇi abhibhavati varṇataḥ ca
evam eva saṃsāra mahā samudra gatam api sarvajña tā citta utpāda anargha mahā maṇi ratnam praṇidhi pota āropitam
prathama citta utpādika bodhisattva adhyāśaya saṃtāna gatam aprāptam eva sarvajña tā nagaram
vimuktinagaram praviṣṭān sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha kāca maṇikān abhibhavati

original: tadyathāsti vaśirājaṃ nāma maṇiratnaṃ yajjambudvīpagatameva catvāriṃśadyojanasahasrasthitānāṃ candrasūryamaṇḍalānāṃ bhavanavimānapratibhāsavyūhān
analyzed: tat yathā asti vaśirājam nāma maṇi ratnam yat jambudvīpa gatam eva catvāriṃśat yojana sahasra sthitānām candra sūrya maṇḍalānām bhavana vimāna pratibhāsa vyūhān
evam eva sarva guṇa pariśodhitam sarvajña tā citta utpāda vaśi rāja maṇi ratnam saṃsāra gatam eva
dharmadhātu gagana gocarāṇām tathāgata mahājñāna sūrya candramasām sarva buddha viṣaya maṇḍala pratibhāsa vyūhān saṃdarśayati
tat yathā kula putra yāvat candra sūrya maṇḍalāni prabhayā avabhāsayanti
atra antare ye kecid dhana dhānya ratna jātarūpa rajata puṣpa gandha mālya vastra paribhogāḥ

original: sarve te vaśirājamaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante,
analyzed: sarve te vaśi rāja maṇi ratnasya mūlyam na kṣamante
evam eva yāvat tri adhvasu sarvajña jñānam dharmadhātu viṣayam avabhāsayati
atra antare yāni kānicid deva manuṣya sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha kuśalāni sa āsravāṇi anāsravāṇi vā

original: sarvāṇi tāni bodhicittotpādavaśirājamahāmaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante /
analyzed: sarvāṇi tāni bodhi citta utpāda vaśi rāja mahā maṇi ratnasya mūlyam na kṣamante

original: tadyathā kulaputra asti sāgaravyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yatsarvamahāsāgaravyūhān saṃdarśayati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra asti sāgaravyūhagarbham nāma mahā maṇi ratnam yat sarva mahā sāgara vyūhān saṃdarśayati
evam eva bodhi citta utpāda sāgara vyūha garbha mahā maṇi ratnam sarvajña jñāna viṣaya sāgara vyūham saṃdarśayati

original: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇiratnaṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ divyena jāmbūnadasuvarṇena,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra cintārāja maṇi ratnam sthāpayitvā na asti kiṃcid prativiśiṣṭataram divyena jāmbūnada suvarṇena
evam eva sarvajña jñānacintā rāja mahā maṇi ratnam
sthāpayitvā na asti kiṃcid prativiśiṣṭataram bodhi citta utpāda divya jāmbūnada suvarṇena

original: tadyathā kulaputra nāgamaṇḍalasiddha āhituṇḍikaḥ sarvanāgoragān vaśe sthāpayati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra nāga maṇḍala siddhaḥ āhituṇḍikaḥ sarva nāga uragān vaśe sthāpayati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda pratipatti nāga maṇḍala siddhaḥ bodhisattva ahituṇḍikaḥ sarva kleśa nāga uragān vaśe sthāpayati

original: tadyathā kulaputra praharaṇagṛhītaḥ śūro durgharṣo bhavati śatrumaṇḍalena,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra praharaṇa gṛhītaḥ śūraḥ durgharṣaḥ bhavati śatru maṇḍalena

original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapraharaṇagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvakleśaśatrumaṇḍalena /
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda praharaṇa gṛhītaḥ bodhisattvaḥ durgharṣaḥ bhavati sarva kleśa śatru maṇḍalena

original: tadyathā kulaputra divyoragasāracandanasya ekacūrṇadhāraṇaṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ gandhena spharati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra divya uraga sāra candanasya eka cūrṇa dhāraṇam sāhasram lokadhātum gandhena spharati

original: karṣapramāṇaṃ sarvatrisāhasre lokadhāturatnaparipūrṇena mūlyaṃ na kṣamate,
analyzed: karṣa pramāṇam sarva tri sāhasre lokadhātu ratna paripūrṇena mūlyam na kṣamate
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda divya uraga sāra candanasya eka adhyāśaya dhātuḥ sarva dharmadhātum guṇa gandhena spharati
sarva śaikṣa aśaikṣa pratyekabuddha cittāni ca abhibhavati

original: tadyathā kulaputra himavaccandanaṃ nāma mahācandanaratnaṃ sarvadāhaṃ praśamayati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra himavaccandanam nāma mahā candana ratnam sarva dāham praśamayati
sarvam ca āśrayam śītalīkaroti
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda himavat candana ratnam sarva kleśa saṃkalpa rāga doṣa moha dāham praśamayati
jñāna āśrayam ca prahlādayati
tat yathā kula putra ye sumerum parvata rājam upasaṃkrāmanti

original: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇāḥ,
analyzed: sarve te eka varṇāḥ bhavanti yat uta suvarṇa varṇāḥ
evam eva ye sarvajña tā citta utpāda samān bodhisattvān upasaṃkrāmanti

original: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta sarvajñatāvarṇāḥ /
analyzed: sarve te eka varṇāḥ bhavanti yat uta sarvajña tā varṇāḥ

original: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya cchavigandhaḥ pravāti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra yaḥ pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya chavi gandhaḥ pravāti

original: sa sarvajambudvīpe sarvavārṣikājātisumanādīnāṃ puṣpajātīnāṃ na saṃvidyate,
analyzed: sa sarva jambudvīpe sarva vārṣikā jāti sumana ādīnām puṣpa jātīnām na saṃvidyate
evam eva yaḥ bodhisattvasya sarvajña tā citta utpāda bīja praṇidhi vṛkṣa guṇa jñāna tvacaḥ gandhaḥ pravāti
sa sarva pratyavara kuśala mūlānām sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha vārṣikā jāti sumanānām anāsrava śīla samādhi prajñā vimukti vimukti jñāna darśanānām na saṃvidyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya śuṅgībhūtasya veditavyaṃ bahūnāṃ puṣpaśatasahasrāṇāmāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya śuṅgībhūtasya veditavyam bahūnām puṣpa śata sahasrāṇām āya dvāram bhaviṣyati iti

original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapāriyātrakavṛkṣasya kuśalamūlaśuṅgībhūtasya veditavyamasaṃkhyeyānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sāsravanāsravabodhikusumāyadvāraṃ  #
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda pāriyātraka vṛkṣasya kuśala mūla śuṅgī bhūtasya veditavyam asaṃkhyeyānām deva manuṣyāṇām sa āsrava nāsrava bodhi kusuma āya dvāram
bhaviṣyati iti

original: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitasya pāriyātrakusumairvastrasya tailasya vā gandhaḥ pravāti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra yaḥ eka divasa paribhāvitasya pāriyātra kusumaiḥ vastrasya tailasya vā gandhaḥ pravāti

original: sa divasatasahasraparibhāvitasya campakavārṣikāsumanābhivastrasya vā tailasya vā na saṃvidyate /
analyzed: sa campaka vārṣika sumanābhi vastrasya vā tailasya vā na saṃvidyate

original: evameva ya ekajanmaparibhāvitasya sarvajñatācittasaṃtānasya bodhisattvaguṇajñānagandho daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhapādamūleṣu pravāti,
analyzed: evam eva yaḥ eka janma paribhāvitasya sarvajña tā citta saṃtānasya bodhisattva guṇa jñāna gandhaḥ daśasu dikṣu sarva buddha pāda mūleṣu pravāti
sa kalpa śata sahasra paribhāvitānām sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha cittānām anāsrava kuśala dharma jñāna gandhaḥ na saṃvidyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra asti nālīkerī nāma vṛkṣajātiḥ udyatake samudre saṃbhūtā /
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra asti nālīkerī nāma vṛkṣa jātiḥ udyatake samudre saṃbhūtā

original: sā mūlata upādāya yāvatpuṣpaphalaparyantātsarvakālaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ na kadācinnopajīvyā bhavati /
analyzed: sā mūlataḥ upādāya yāvat puṣpa phala paryantāt sarvakālam sarva sattvānām na kadācid na upajīvyā bhavati

original: evameva mahākaruṇāpraṇidhimūlasaṃjāto bodhisattvasya prathamasarvajñatācittotpādo yāvatsaddharmasthitiparyavasānāt sadevakasya lokasya na kadācinnopajīvyo  #
analyzed: evam eva mahā karuṇā praṇidhi mūla saṃjātaḥ bodhisattvasya prathama sarvajña tā citta utpādaḥ yāvat saddharma sthiti paryavasānāt sa devakasya lokasya na kadācid na upajīvyaḥ
bhavati

original: tadyathā kulaputra asti hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātam /
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra asti hāṭakaprabhāsam nāma rasa jātam
tasya eka palam loha pala sahasram svarṇīkaroti

original: na ca tadrasapalaṃ śakyaṃ tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ na lohīkartum /
analyzed: na ca tat rasa palam śakyam tena loha pala sahasreṇa paryādātum na lohīkartum
evam eva eka sarvajña tā citta utpāda rasa dhātuḥ kuśala mūla pariṇāmanā jñāna saṃgṛhītaḥ sarva karma kleśa āvaraṇa lohāni
paryādāya sarva dharmān sarvajña tā varṇān karoti

original: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaṃ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
analyzed: na ca sarvajña tā citta utpāda rasa dhātuḥ śakyam sarva karma kleśa lohaiḥ saṃkleśayitum paryādātum vā

original: tadyathā kulaputra kiyatparītto 'pyagniryāvadupādānaṃ labhate tāvatīṃ jvālāṃ pramuñcati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra kiyat parīttaḥ pi agniḥ yāvat upādānam labhate tāvatīm jvālām pramuñcati
evam eva kiyat parīttaḥ sarvajña tā citta utpāda agniḥ ārambaṇa vyavakīrṇa tayā yāvat saṃbhāra upādānam labhate
tāvat vivardhate jñāna arciḥ pramocana tayā
tat yathā kula putraḥ ekasmāt pradīpāt anekāni pradīpa koṭī śata sahasrāṇi ādīpyante

original: akṣaya eva pradīpo bhavatyaparyādattaḥ sarvapradīpaniryāṇaiḥ evameva ekasmātsarvajñatācittotpādapradīpādatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
analyzed: akṣayaḥ eva pradīpaḥ bhavati a paryādattaḥ sarva pradīpa niryāṇaiḥ evam eva ekasmāt sarvajña tā citta utpāda pradīpāt atīta anāgata pratyutpannānām

original: sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpānāṃ dīpyamānānāmakṣaya eva sa ekaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo
analyzed: sarva tathāgatānām sarvajña tā citta utpāda pradīpānām dīpyamānānām akṣayaḥ eva saḥ ekaḥ sarvajña tā citta utpāda pradīpaḥ
vabhāti a paryādattaḥ sarvajña tā citta utpāda pradīpa niryāṇaiḥ

original: tadyathā kulaputra ekaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vātāyane vā praveśyate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putraḥ ekaḥ pradīpaḥ yādṛśe gṛhe vātāyane vā praveśyate

original: sahapraveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitamapi tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati avabhāsaṃ ca karoti,
analyzed: saha praveśitaḥ varṣa sahasra saṃcitam api tamaḥ ndhakāram vidhamati avabhāsam ca karoti
evam eva eka sarvajña tā citta utpāda pradīpaḥ yādṛśe sattva āśaya gṛha gahane vidyā tamaḥ ndhakāra anugate praveśyate
sa saha praveśitaḥ na abhilāpya kalpa śata sahasra saṃcitam api kleśa āvaraṇa tamaḥ ndhakāram vidhamati
jñāna ālokam ca saṃjanayati

original: tadyathā kulaputra yādṛśī pradīpavartirbhavati tādṛśaṃ pradīpo 'vabhāsaṃ karoti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra yādṛśī pradīpa vartiḥ bhavati tādṛśam pradīpaḥ vabhāsam karoti
yāvān ca sneha saṃcayaḥ bhavati tāvat dīpyate

original: evameva yasya bodhisattvasya yādṛśī praṇidhānavartiviśeṣatā bhavati,
analyzed: evam eva yasya bodhisattvasya yādṛśī praṇidhāna varti viśeṣa tā bhavati
tādṛśam sarvajña tā citta utpāda pradīpaḥ dharmadhātu avabhāsam karoti
yāvat ca mahā karuṇā caryā sneha saṃcayaḥ bhavati
tāvat sattva vinaya kṣetra viśuddhi buddha kārya prabhāvanā bhavati

original: tadyathā kulaputra divyajāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāro vaśavartino devarājasya mūrdhnāvabaddho 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvakāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra divya jāmbūnada suvarṇa alaṃkāraḥ vaśavartinaḥ devarājasya mūrdhnā avabaddhaḥ saṃhāryaḥ bhavati sarva kāmāvacaraiḥ devaputraiḥ
evam eva pratipatti guṇa pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvajña tā citta utpāda divya jāmbūnada suvarṇa alaṃkāraḥ
vinivartanīyānām bodhisattvānām mahā praṇidhāna mūrdhnā avabaddhaḥ saṃhāryaḥ bhavati
sarva bāla pṛthagjana śaikṣa aśaikṣa pratyekabuddhaiḥ

original: tadyathā kulaputra siṃhasya mṛgarājasya nādena acirajātāḥ siṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra siṃhasya mṛga rājasya nādena acira jātāḥ siṃha potāḥ puṣyanti
sarva mṛgāḥ ca vilayam gacchanti

original: evameva tathāgatapuruṣasiṃhasya bodhicittasaṃvarṇanasarvajñatānādena prayuktena sarvādikarmikabodhisattvasiṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti buddhadharmaiḥ,
analyzed: evam eva tathāgata puruṣa siṃhasya bodhi citta saṃvarṇana sarvajña tā nādena prayuktena sarva ādi karmika bodhisattva siṃha potāḥ puṣyanti buddha dharmaiḥ
sarva upalambha saṃniśritāḥ ca sattvāḥ vilayam gacchanti
tat yathā kula putra siṃha snāyu kṛta vīṇā tantrī śabdena sarva vīṇā tantryaḥ saṃchidyante
evam eva pāramitā śarīra tathāgata siṃha bodhi citta utpāda snāyu tantrī guṇa varṇa śabdena sarva kāma guṇa rati vīṇā tantryaḥ saṃchidyante
sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha caryā guṇa kathāḥ ca saṃnirūdhyante
tat yathā kula putra go mahiṣī ajā kṣīra pūrṇa mahā samudre eka siṃha dugdha bindu prakṣepeṇa sarva kṣīrāṇi apakrāmanti
na saṃdhayati
evam eva kalpa śata sahasra saṃcitaḥ karma kleśa kṣīra mahā samudraḥ tathāgata mahāpuruṣa siṃha sarvajña tā citta utpāda dugdha eka bindu prakṣepeṇa sarvaḥ nava śeṣaḥ  /
kṣayam gacchanti
sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha vimuktayaḥ ca na saṃtiṣṭhante
na saṃvasati

original: tadyathā kulaputra aṇḍakośādanirgatasya kalaviṅkapotasya yo nādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvabalavegasaṃpannānāṃ himavannivāsināṃ sarvapakṣigaṇānāṃ na
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra aṇḍakośāt a nirgatasya kalaviṅka potasya yaḥ nāda bala viśeṣaḥ sarva bala vega saṃpannānām himavat nivāsinām sarva pakṣi gaṇānām na
evam eva yaḥ saṃsāra aṇḍa kośa gatasya ādi karmika bodhisattva kalaviṅka potasya mahā karuṇā bodhi citta nāda bala viśeṣaḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām na

original: tadyathā kulaputra yo 'cirajātasya mahāgaruḍendrapotasya pakṣavātabalaparākramo nayanapariśuddhiguṇaśca, (Gv 403)
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra cira jātasya mahāgaruḍa indra potasya pakṣa vāta bala parākramaḥ nayana pariśuddhi guṇaḥ ca

original: sa sarvaśarīrapravṛddhānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ na saṃvidyate,
analyzed: sa sarva śarīra pravṛddhānām tad anyeṣām pakṣiṇām na saṃvidyate
evam eva yaḥ prathamacittotpādikasya tathāgata mahāgaruḍa indrasya kula gotra saṃbhavasya
bodhisattva mahā garuḍa indra potasya sarvajña tā citta utpāda bala parākramaḥ mahā karuṇā adhyāśaya nayana pariśuddhi guṇaḥ ca
sa kalpa śata sahasra niryātānām sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām na saṃvidyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra mahāpuruṣahastagato nārācaḥ kiyaddṛḍhamapi varma nirbhinatti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra mahāpuruṣa hasta gataḥ nārācaḥ kiyat dṛḍham api varma nirbhinatti
evam eva dṛḍhavīrya bodhisattva hasta gataḥ sarvajña tā citta utpāda nārācaḥ sarva dṛṣṭi anuśaya varmāṇi nirbhinatti
tat yathā kula putra
krodha āviṣṭasya mahānagnasya yāvat lalāṭe piṭakāḥ tiṣṭhanti
tāvat aghṛṣyaḥ bhavati sarva jambudvīpakaiḥ manuṣyaiḥ

original: evameva mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāviṣṭasya bodhisattvamahānagnasya yāvadadhyāśayavadane sarvajñatācittotpādapiṭakā na vigacchanti,
analyzed: evam eva mahā maitrī mahā karūṇā āviṣṭasya bodhisattva mahānagnasya yāvat adhyāśaya vadane sarvajña tā citta utpāda piṭakāḥ na vigacchanti
tāvat aghṛṣyaḥ bhavati sarva lokadhātu paryāpannaiḥ sarva māraiḥ sarva karmabhiḥ ca

original: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ śikṣitasyeṣvastrāntevāsina iṣvastrajñāne kṛtābhyāsasya śilpasthānayogabalaviśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra yaḥ śikṣitasya iṣvastra antevāsinaḥ iṣvastra jñāne kṛta abhyāsasya śilpasthāna yoga bala viśeṣaḥ
sa sarva śikṣitasya iṣu astra ācāryasya na saṃvidyate

original: evameva yaḥ sarvādikarmikasya sarvajñatābhūmyā kṛtābhyāsasya bodhisattvājāneyasya praṇidhijñānādhimukticaryābalaviśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: evam eva yaḥ sarva ādi karmikasya sarvajña tā bhūmyā kṛta abhyāsasya bodhisattva ajāneyasya praṇidhi jñāna adhimukti caryā bala viśeṣaḥ
saḥ na utpādita bodhi cittānām sarva śaikṣa aśaikṣa pratyekabuddhānām ca na saṃvidyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra iṣvastraṃ śikṣamāṇasya prathamaḥ padabandhayogyābhyāsaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati sarveṣvastrajñānasya,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putraḥ iṣu astram śikṣamāṇasya prathamaḥ padabandha yogya abhyāsaḥ pūrvaṃgamaḥ bhavati sarva iṣu astra jñānasya

original: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvajñabhūmau śikṣamāṇasya prathamaṃ sarvajñatācittādhyāśayasaṃprasthānaṃ pūrvagamaṃ bhavati sarvabuddhadharmādhigamāya
analyzed: evam eva bodhisattvasya sarvajña bhūmau śikṣamāṇasya prathamam sarvajña tā citta adhyāśaya saṃprasthānam pūrva gamam bhavati sarva buddha dharma adhigamāya

original: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya māyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya prathamamantrapadasiddhyabhinirhārameva manasikurvāṇasya sarvakriyāsiddhirbhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra māyākārasya māyā gata viṣayam saṃdarśayamānasya prathama mantra pada siddhi abhinirhāram eva manasikurvāṇasya sarva kriyā siddhiḥ bhavati

original: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayavikurvāḥ saṃdarśayataḥ prathamacittotpādapraṇidhānābhinirhāra evotthāpako bhavati sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayasya
analyzed: evam eva bodhisattvasya sarva buddha bodhisattva viṣaya vikurvāḥ saṃdarśayataḥ prathama citta utpāda praṇidhāna abhinirhāraḥ eva utthāpakaḥ bhavati sarva buddha bodhisattva viṣayasya

original: tadyathā kulaputra sarvamāyāvidyāmantrāścārūpiṇo 'nidarśanāḥ sarvamāyānirmāṇarūpagatāni saṃdarśayanti cittotpādena,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra sarva māyā vidyā mantrāḥ ca arūpiṇaḥ nidarśanāḥ sarva māyā nirmāṇa rūpa gatāni saṃdarśayanti citta utpādena
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpādaḥ ca ārūpya a nidarśanaḥ sarva dharmadhātum viṭhapayati sarva guṇa alaṃkāra vyūhaiḥ citta utpāda vaśitā mātreṇa

original: tadyathā kulaputra mārjārasya sahadṛṣṭavicāramātreṇa sarvamūṣikā vilayamāpadyante,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra mārjārasya saha dṛṣṭa vicāra mātreṇa sarva mūṣikāḥ vilayam āpadyante
evam eva bodhisattvasya sarvajña tā citta utpāda adhyāśaya prayoga vicāra mātreṇa sarva karma kleśāḥ vilayam āpadyante

original: tadyathā kulaputra jāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāra ābaddhaḥ sarvābharaṇāni jihmīkaroti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra jāmbūnada suvarṇa alaṃkāraḥ ābaddhaḥ sarva ābharaṇāni jihmīkaroti
evam eva bodhi citta jāmbūnada suvarṇa alaṃkāra adhyāśaya avabaddhaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha guṇa alaṃkārān abhibhavati jihmīkaroti

original: tadyathā kulaputra ayaskāntarājasya kiyatparītto 'pi dhātuḥ sarvadṛḍhamāyasaṃ bandhanaṃ sphoṭayati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra ayaskānta rājasya kiyat parīttaḥ dhātuḥ sarva dṛḍham āyasam bandhanam sphoṭayati
evam eva kiyat parīttaḥ pi adhyāśaya utpāditaḥ sarvajña tā citta utpāda dhātuḥ
sarva dṛṣṭi kṛta avidyā tṛṣṇā bandhanāni sphoṭayati
tat yathā kula putra yatra yatra eva ayaskānta dhātuḥ vicāryate
tatra tatra eva sarvāṇi itarāṇi ayāṃsi palāyante
na tiṣṭhante na saṃdadhati

original: evameva yatra yatraiva sarvajñatācittotpādadhāturvicāryate kārmeṣu vā kleśeṣu vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktau vā,
analyzed: evam eva yatra yatra eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda dhātuḥ vicāryate kārmeṣu vā kleśeṣu vā śrāvaka pratyekabuddha vimuktau vā

original: tatastata eva karmakleśāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktayaśca palāyante na tiṣṭhanti,
analyzed: tatas tatas eva karma kleśāḥ sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha vimuktayaḥ ca palāyante na tiṣṭhanti
na saṃdadhati

original: tadyathā kulaputra makaraviddhāśritaḥ kaivartaḥ sarvodakaprāṇibhayavinirvṛto bhavatyanupaghātaśarīro makaramukhagato 'pi,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra makara viddha āśritaḥ kaivartaḥ sarva udaka prāṇi bhaya vinirvṛtaḥ bhavati anupaghāta śarīraḥ makara mukha gataḥ pi
evam eva adhyāśaya bodhi citta viddha āśritaḥ
bodhisattvaḥ sarva saṃsāra karma kleśa bhaya vinivṛttaḥ bhavati sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha abhisamaya antara prāpti anughātyaḥ bhūta koṭī sākṣātkriyā praṇāśa pathā patana tayā

original: tadyathā kulaputra amṛtapānapītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaparopakramairna mriyate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra amṛta pāna pītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarva para upakramaiḥ na mriyate

original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāmṛtapānapīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakabhūmiṣu na mriyate,
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda amṛta pāna pītaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva śrāvaka bhūmiṣu na mriyate
na ca uparamati bodhisattva mahā karuṇā praṇidhānāt

original: tadyathā kulaputra añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvamanuṣyabhavaneṣu cānuvicarati na ca sarvamanuṣyairdṛśyate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra añjana siddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sarva manuṣya bhavaneṣu ca anuvicarati na ca sarva manuṣyaiḥ dṛśyate
evam eva bodhi citta utpāda prajñā praṇidhi upastabdhaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva māra viṣayeṣu ca anuvicarati
sarva māraiḥ ca na dṛśyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra mahārājasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaprākṛtajanāt na bibheti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra mahā rāja saṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarva prākṛta janāt na bibheti
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda mahā dharmarāja saṃniśritaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva āvaraṇa nivaraṇa durgatibhyaḥ na bibheti
tat yathā kula putra parvata gṛheṣu sarva bhūmi antargata pānīya bhayāt na asti agni bhayam
evam eva bodhi citta kuśala mūla abhiṣyandita saṃtānasya bodhisattvasya na asti śrāvaka pratyekabuddha vimukti jñāna agni bhayam

original: tadyathā kulaputra śūrasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśatrubhyo na bibheti,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra śūra saṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarva śatrubhyaḥ na bibheti

original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaśūrasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvaduścaritaśatrubhyo na bibheti /
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda śūra saṃniśritaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva duścarita śatrubhyaḥ na bibheti

original: tadyathā kulaputra vajrapraharaṇagṛhītaḥ śakro devendraḥ sarvāsuragaṇaṃ pramardayati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vajra praharaṇa gṛhītaḥ śakraḥ deva indraḥ sarva asura gaṇam pramardayati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda dṛḍha adhyāśaya vajra praharaṇa gṛhītaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarva māra para pravādya sura gaṇam pramardayati

original: tadyathā kulaputra rasāyanopayuktaḥ puruṣo dīrghamāyuḥ pālayati na ca durbalībhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra rasāyana upayuktaḥ puruṣaḥ dīrgham āyuḥ pālayati na ca durbalībhavati

original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādarasāyanasaṃbhāraprayukto bodhisattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaranna parikhidyate,
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda rasāyana saṃbhāra prayuktaḥ bodhisattvaḥ saṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaran na parikhidyate
na ca saṃsāra doṣaiḥ lipyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra sarvabhaiṣajyarasasaṃprayogeṣu pānīyaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ na kvacidduṣyati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra sarva bhaiṣajya rasa saṃprayogeṣu pānīyam pūrvaṃgamam na kvacid duṣyati
evam eva sarva bodhisattva caryā praṇidhāna saṃbhāra yogeṣu sarvajña tā citta utpādaḥ pūrvaṃgamaḥ bhavati
na kvacid duṣyati

original: tadyathā kulaputra puruṣasya sarvakāryeṣu jīvitendriyaṃ pūrvaṃgamam,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra puruṣasya sarva kāryeṣu jīvita indriyam pūrvaṃgamam
evam eva bodhisattvasya sarva buddha dharma ādāneṣu bodhi cittam pūrvaṃgamam

original: tadyathā kulaputra jīvitendriyavimuktaḥ puruṣo nirupajīvyo bhavati mātāpitṛjñātivargasya sarvakarmāsamarthatvāt,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra jīvita indriya vimuktaḥ puruṣaḥ nirupajīvyaḥ bhavati mātā pitṛ jñāti vargasya sarva karma asamartha tvāt

original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaviyukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāguṇanirupajīvyo bhavati sarvasattvānāṃ buddhajñānapratilambhāsamarthatvāt /
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda viyuktaḥ bodhisattvaḥ sarvajña tā guṇa nirupajīvyaḥ bhavati sarva sattvānām buddha jñāna pratilambha asamartha tvāt
tat yathā kula putra mahā samudraḥ sarva viṣaiḥ a dūṣyaḥ bhavati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda mahā samudraḥ dūṣyaḥ bhavati sarva karma kleśa śrāvaka pratyekabuddha citta utpāda viṣaiḥ
tat yathā kula putra sūrya maṇḍalam aparyantaḥ sarva tārā avabhāsaiḥ
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda sūrya maṇḍalam a paryāpannam bhavati
sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha tārā anāsrava guṇān abhibhavati

original: tadyathā kulaputra acirajāto rājaputro mūrdhaprāptān sarvavṛddhāmātyānabhibhavati kulābhijātyādhipatyena,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra acira jātaḥ rāja putraḥ mūrdha prāptān sarva vṛddha amātyān abhibhavati kula abhijāti ādhipatyena
evam eva acira utpādita bodhi cittaḥ tathāgata dharmarāja kula pratyājātaḥ ādi karmikaḥ bodhisattvaḥ cira carita brahmacaryān vṛddha śrāvakān abhibhavati bodhi citta mahā karuṇā ādhipatyena

original: tadyathā kulaputra kiyadvṛddhenāpyamātyena kiyadbālasyāpi rājakumārasya praṇipatitavyam,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra kiyat vṛddhena api amātyena kiyat bālasya api rāja kumārasya praṇipatitavyam

original: na ca rājaputreṇa vṛddhāmātyasya gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam,
analyzed: na ca rāja putreṇa vṛddha amātyasya gauravam na karaṇīyam

original: evameva kiyadvṛddhairapi ciracaritabrahmacaryaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya avanamitavyam,
analyzed: evam eva kiyat vṛddhaiḥ api cira carita brahmacaryaiḥ śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ ādi karmikasya bodhisattvasya avanamitavyam

original: na ca bodhisattvena pratyekabuddheṣu gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam /
analyzed: na ca bodhisattvena pratyekabuddheṣu gauravam na karaṇīyam
tat yathā kula putra

original: sarvāparibhūto rājaputro 'virahito rājalakṣaṇena sarvāgratāprāptairapi rājāmātyairna samo jātyadhyakṣatvāt,
analyzed: sarva aparibhūtaḥ rāja putraḥ virahitaḥ rāja lakṣaṇena sarva agra tā prāptaiḥ api rāja amātyaiḥ na samaḥ jāti adhyakṣa tvāt
evam eva kiyat karma kleśa upādāna paribhūtaḥ ādi karmikaḥ bodhisattvaḥ
sarvajña tā citta utpāda lakṣaṇena avirahitaḥ sarva agra prāptaiḥ api sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ na samaḥ buddha kula ādhipatya adhyakṣa tvāt
tat yathā kula putra pariśuddha maṇi ratnam cakṣuḥ timira doṣeṇa a pariśuddham iti ābhāsam āgacchati
evam eva prakṛti pariśuddham sarvajña tā citta utpāda ratnam sattvāḥ aśraddhā nayana ajñāna timira doṣeṇa a pariśuddham iti saṃjānanti

original: tadyathā kulaputra sarvavidyauṣadhisaṃgrahasaṃprayukto bhaiṣajyavigraho darśanasparśanasaṃvāsanaiḥ sattvānāṃ vyādhīn śamayati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra sarva vidyā oṣadhi saṃgraha saṃprayuktaḥ bhaiṣajya vigrahaḥ darśana sparśana saṃvāsanaiḥ sattvānām vyādhīn śamayati
evam eva sarva kuśala mūla upacaya prajñā upāya vidyā oṣadhi saṃgṛhītam bodhi citta saṃprayuktam
bodhisattva praṇidhi jñāna śarīram śravaṇa darśana saṃvāsana anusmṛti prayogena sattvānām
kleśa vyādhīn praśamati

original: tadyathā kulaputra haṃsalakṣaṇaṃ vastraṃ sarvakardamadoṣairna kliśyate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra haṃsa lakṣaṇam vastram sarva kardama doṣaiḥ na kliśyate
evam eva bodhi citta utpāda haṃsa lakṣaṇa vastram saṃsāra kleśa kardama doṣaiḥ na kliśyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra mūrdhaśalyasaṃgṛhīto dāruvigraho na vikīryate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra mūrdha śalya saṃgṛhītaḥ dāru vigrahaḥ na vikīryate
sarva kriyāḥ ca anubhavati
evam eva bodhi citta utpāda praṇidhi mūrdha śalya saṃgṛhītam sarvajña tā praṇidhi jñāna śarīram bodhisattva kriyā samartham bhavati
na ca vikīryate sarvajña tā praṇidhi śarīra tvāt

original: tadyathā kulaputra śalyavimuktaṃ yantramakāryasamarthaṃ bhavati tānyeva dārupratyaṅgāni,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra śalya vimuktam yantram akārya samartham bhavati tāni eva dāru pratyaṅgāni
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda adhyāśaya viyuktaḥ bodhisattvaḥ buddha dharma pariniṣpādanā samarthaḥ bhavati
evam ca te bodhyaṅga saṃbhārāḥ

original: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino hastigarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaruratnam /
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra rājñaḥ cakravartinaḥ hastigarbham nāma kālāgaru ratnam

original: tena saha dhūpitamātraḥ sarvarājñaścaturaṅgabalakāyo vihāyase tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: tena saha dhūpita mātraḥ sarva rājñaḥ caturaṅga balakāyaḥ vihāyase tiṣṭhati

original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāgarudhūpitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni sarvatraidhātukavyativṛttāni bhavanti asaṃskṛtasarvatathāgatajñānagaganagocaraparyavasānāni
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda agaru dhūpitāni bodhisattvasya kuśala mūlāni sarva traidhātuka vyativṛttāni bhavanti a saṃskṛta sarva tathāgata jñāna gagana gocara paryavasānāni
tat yathā kula putra vajram na itarāt ratna ākarāt utpadyate nyatra vajra ākarāt suvarṇa ākarāt vā
evam eva vajra upamaḥ sarvajña tā citta utpādaḥ
sa na itarāt sattva āśaya kuśala mūla ratna ākarāt utpadyate nyatra sattva paritrāṇa mahā karuṇā vajra ākarāt sarvajña jñāna adhyālambana mahā suvarṇa ākarāt vā
tat yathā kula putra asti amūlā nāma vṛkṣa jātiḥ

original: tasya mūlapratiṣṭhānaṃ nopalabhyate sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśasaṃkusumitā ca vṛkṣeṣu jālībhūtā ca saṃdṛśyate,
analyzed: tasya mūla pratiṣṭhānam na upalabhyate sarva śākhā patra palāśa saṃkusumitā ca vṛkṣeṣu jālībhūtā ca saṃdṛśyate
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpādasya mūla pratiṣṭhānam na upalabhyate
sarva puṇya jñāna abhijñā saṃkusumitaḥ ca sa sarva loka upapattiṣu mahā praṇidhāna jālībhūtaḥ saṃdṛśyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ netare bhājane tiṣṭhacchobhate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vajram na itare bhājane tiṣṭhat śobhate
na api chidra śuṣira bhājanena śakyam saṃdhārayitum anyatra a chidra bhājanena

original: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ na hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattvabhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpannacitteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣitasmṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda vajram na hīna adhimuktikeṣu sattva bhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpanna citteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣita smṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu
na adhyāśaya vipanna cala acala buddhi sarva bhājanena śakyam saṃdhārayitum anyatra bodhisattva adhyāśaya ratna bhājanena
tat yathā kula putra vajram sarva ratnāni nirvidhyāti
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda vajram sarva dharma ratnāni nirvidhyati
tat yathā vajram sarva śailāni bhinatti
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda vajram sarva dṛṣṭi gata śailāni bhinatti

original: tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaratnaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra bhinnam api vajra ratnam sarva ratna prativiśiṣṭam suvarṇa alaṃkāram abhibhavati
evam eva āśaya vipatti bhinnam api sarvajña tā citta utpāda vajra ratnam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha guṇa suvarṇa alaṃkārān abhibhavati

original: (Gv 406) tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvadāridryaṃ vinivartayati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra bhinnam api vajra ratnam sarva dāridryam vinivartayati
evam eva pratibhinnam api sarvajña tā citta utpāda vajra ratnam sarva saṃsāra dāridryam vinivartayati
tat yathā kula putra kiyat parīttaḥ vajra dhātuḥ sarva maṇi pāṣāṇa bheda lakṣaṇaḥ
evam eva kiyat parītta ārambaṇa prasṛtaḥ pi sarvajña tā citta utpāda vajra dhātuḥ sarva ajñāna bheda lakṣaṇaḥ

original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraratnaṃ na prākṛtajanahastagataṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vajra ratnam na prākṛta jana hasta gatam bhavati
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda vajra ratnam
na prākṛta adhyāśayānām itvara kuśala mūlānām deva manuṣyāṇām hasta gatam bhavati

original: tadyathā kulaputra ratnaparīkṣānabhijñaḥ puruṣo vajramaṇiratnaguṇānajānan nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra ratna parīkṣā anabhijñaḥ puruṣaḥ vajra maṇi ratna guṇān a jānan na asya guṇa viśeṣam anubhavati
evam eva duṣprajña jātīyaḥ puruṣa pudgalaḥ bodhisattva citta mahā prajñā vajra ratna guṇa anabhijñaḥ na asya guṇa viśeṣam anubhavati

original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vajram na śakyam jarayitum

original: evameva sarvajñatāhetubhūtaṃ bodhicittotpādavajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum /
analyzed: evam eva sarvajña tā hetu bhūtam bodhi citta utpāda vajram na śakyam jarayitum

original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ mahāpraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ mahānagnenāpi saṃdhārayitumanyatra mahānārāyaṇasthāmabalavegena,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vajram mahā praharaṇam na śakyam mahā nagnena api saṃdhārayitum anyatra mahānārāyaṇa sthāma bala vegena
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda mahā vajra praharaṇam na śakyam sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha mahānagnaiḥ api
saṃdhārayitum anyatra sarvajña tā hetu bala upastabdha apramāṇa kuśala mūla mahānārāyaṇa sthāma prativiśiṣṭaiḥ mahā avabhāsa prāptaiḥ mahā bodhisattvaiḥ

original: tadyathā kulaputra yatra sarvapraharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajraṃ prasahate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra yatra sarva praharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajram prasahate
na pratihanyate

original: evameva yatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapraṇidhijñānapraharaṇāni na prasahante sattvaparipākavinaye vā tryadhvakalpacaryāduḥkhasaṃvāse vā,
analyzed: evam eva yatra sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddha praṇidhi jñāna praharaṇāni na prasahante sattva paripāka vinaye vā tri adhva kalpa caryā duḥkha saṃvāse vā
tatra sarvajña tā citta utpāda mahā vajra praharaṇa gṛhītaḥ parikhinna mānasaḥ prasahate
na pratihanyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ kenacitpṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitumanyatra vajratalena,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vajram na śakyam kenacid pṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitum anyatra vajra talena
evam eva sarva śrāvaka pratyekabuddhaiḥ bodhisattva niryāṇa praṇidhāna saṃbhāra vajram na śakyam saṃdhārayitum anyatra adhyāśaya bodhi citta utpāda vajra dṛḍha pṛthivī talena
tat yathā kula putra dṛḍha vajra tala acchidra bhājana tvāt mahā samudre pānīyam na visarati

original: evameva bodhisattvavajrācchidradṛḍhatalapariṇāmanāpratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante sarvabhavopapattiṣu /
analyzed: evam eva bodhisattva vajra acchidra dṛḍha tala pariṇāmanā pratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśala mūlāni na kṣīyante sarva bhava upapattiṣu

original: tadyathā kulaputra vajratalapratiṣṭhitā mahāpṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vajra tala pratiṣṭhitā mahā pṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati

original: evameva bodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni sarvatraidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti /
analyzed: evam eva bodhi citta utpāda vajra dṛḍha tala pratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattva praṇidhānāni sarva traidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti
tat yathā kula putra vajram udakena na klidyate

original: evameva bodhicittotpādavajraṃ sarvakarmakleśodakena sarvakarmasaṃvāsairna klidyate na svidyate /
analyzed: evam eva bodhi citta utpāda vajram sarva karma kleśa udakena sarva karma saṃvāsaiḥ na klidyate na svidyate

original: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvāgnidāhairna dahyate na saṃtapyate,
analyzed: tat yathā kula putra vajram sarva agni dāhaiḥ na dahyate na saṃtapyate
evam eva sarvajña tā citta utpāda vajram sarva saṃsāra duḥkha agni dāhaiḥ na dahyate
sarva kleśa agni tāpaiḥ na saṃtapyate
tat yathā kula putra tathāgatānām arhatām samyaksaṃbuddhānām bodhimaṇḍe

original: niṣīdatāṃ māraṃ yodhayatāṃ sarvajñatābhisaṃbuddhamānānāṃ nānyena pṛthivīpradeśena śakyamāsanaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra trisāhasramahāsāhasravajranābhidharaṇitalena,
analyzed: niṣīdatām māram yodhayatām sarvajña tā abhisaṃbuddha mānānām na anyena pṛthivī pradeśena śakyam āsanam saṃdhārayitum anyatra tri sāhasra mahā sāhasra vajranābhi dharaṇi talena

original: evameva bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatāṃ caryāṃ caratāṃ pāramitāḥ
analyzed: evam eva bodhisattvānām anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatām caryām caratām pāramitāḥ

original: paripūrayatāṃ kṣāntimavakrāmatāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhamānānāṃ kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayatāṃ
analyzed: paripūrayatām kṣāntim avakrāmatām bhūmim pratilabhamānānām kuśala mūlāni pariṇāmayatām
vyākaraṇam saṃpratīcchatām sarva bodhisattva mārga saṃbhāram upastambhayatām sarva tathāgatānām

original: mahādharmameghān saṃdhārayatāṃ te mahākuśalamūlabalādhānavegā nānyena cittena śakyāḥ
analyzed: mahā dharma meghān saṃdhārayatām te mahā kuśala mūla bala ādhāna vegāḥ na anyena cittena śakyāḥ
saṃdhārayitum anyatra sarva praṇidhāna jñāna vajra dṛḍhanābhinā sarvajña tā citta utpādena

original: iti hi (Gv 407) kulaputra ebhiśca anyaiśca apramāṇairyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /
analyzed: iti hi gu kula putraḥ ebhiḥ ca anyaiḥ ca apramāṇaiḥ yāvat anabhilāpya anabhilāpyaiḥ guṇa viśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajña tā citta utpādaḥ

original: te 'pi sattvā evaṃguṇadharmasamanvāgatā bhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti ca,
analyzed: te pi sattvāḥ evaṃguṇa dharma samanvāgatāḥ bhūtāḥ ca bhaviṣyanti ca
yaiḥ anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittāni utpāditāni
tasmāt tarhi kula putra su labdhāḥ te lābhāḥ

original: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parimārgasi eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ pratilābhāya //
analyzed: yaḥ tvam anuttarāyām samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya bodhisattva caryām parimārgasi eṣām guṇānām pratilābhāya
